https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6OUjPWqqRMqxPhTYeZ1loXuQDkI.jpg Christmas in the Smokies is a modern day Christmas classic set in the beautiful Smoky Mountains. It tells the story of one family's journey to save their historic berry farm against all odds during one fateful holiday season. Christmas in the Smokies
